function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Incomplete elimination of bias in the detection, collection, synthesis, and description of studies","Impact":"Misleading or inaccurate findings leading to incorrect conclusions","Mitigation":"Implement rigorous bias detection and collection procedures, and utilize advanced data synthesis methods","Technologies":"Advanced data analysis and synthesis tools","People":"Researchers, authors","Owner":"Research institutions, academic journals"},{"Description":"Inadequate surveillance techniques leading to uncontrolled disease proliferation","Impact":"Outbreak of contagious diseases due to lack of effective surveillance","Mitigation":"Implement advanced and effective surveillance techniques, improve monitoring and detection methods","Technologies":"Advanced monitoring and detection technology","People":"General public, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Health organizations, governments"},{"Description":"Inaccurate bibliometric analysis leading to misinterpretation of publishing patterns and citation trends","Impact":"Incorrect understanding of research relevance and impact","Mitigation":"Utilize robust and validated bibliometric analysis methods, perform thorough validation of citation data","Technologies":"Bibliometric analysis tools, validation algorithms","People":"Researchers, authors, publishers","Owner":"Research institutions, academic publishers"}]}
